00051 class OPENMM_EXPORT GBSAOBCForce : public Force {
00052 public:
00056     enum NonbondedMethod {
00061         NoCutoff = 0,
00065         CutoffNonPeriodic = 1,
00070         CutoffPeriodic = 2,
00071     };
00072     /*
00073      * Create a GBSAOBCForce.
00074      */
00075     GBSAOBCForce();
00079     int getNumParticles() const {
00080         return particles.size();
00081     }
00091     int addParticle(double charge, double radius, double scalingFactor);
00100     void getParticleParameters(int index, double& charge, double& radius, double& scalingFactor) const;
00109     void setParticleParameters(int index, double charge, double radius, double scalingFactor);
00113     double getSolventDielectric() const {
00114         return solventDielectric;
00115     }
00119     void setSolventDielectric(double dielectric) {
00120         solventDielectric = dielectric;
00121     }
00125     double getSoluteDielectric() const {
00126         return soluteDielectric;
00127     }
00131     void setSoluteDielectric(double dielectric) {
00132         soluteDielectric = dielectric;
00133     }
00137     NonbondedMethod getNonbondedMethod() const;
00141     void setNonbondedMethod(NonbondedMethod method);
00148     double getCutoffDistance() const;
00155     void setCutoffDistance(double distance);
00156 protected:
00157     ForceImpl* createImpl();
00158 private:
00159     class ParticleInfo;
00160     NonbondedMethod nonbondedMethod;
00161     double cutoffDistance, solventDielectric, soluteDielectric;
00162     std::vector<ParticleInfo> particles;
00163 };
00164 
00169 class GBSAOBCForce::ParticleInfo {
00170 public:
00171     double charge, radius, scalingFactor;
00172     ParticleInfo() {
00173         charge = radius = scalingFactor = 0.0;
00174     }
00175     ParticleInfo(double charge, double radius, double scalingFactor) :
00176         charge(charge), radius(radius), scalingFactor(scalingFactor) {
00177     }
00178 };
